==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=邯郸学步|type=211}}

===Etymology===
From [[w:Zhuangzi|Zhuangzi]]
* Literally: study the walking (method of the people of) [[w:Handan|Handan]] (city)
*: According to legend, a person from [[w:Yan (state)|Yan]] travelled to [[w:Handan|Handan]] city in the state of [[w:Zhao (state)|Zhao]]. When he got there, he became infatuated with their unique way of walking. He tried to imitate it so intently, but was unsuccessful. He tried so intently that he forgot his own method of walking, and ended up crawling back to [[w:Yan (state)|Yan]].
